snippet: Insurgents used sulfur mustard in August, which probably resulted killed an infant, the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons said.
abstract: Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons reports that Syrian insurgents' use of mustard gas likely caused death of infant in August 2015.
lead_paragraph: Insurgents used sulfur mustard in August, which probably resulted killed an infant, the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons said.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Syria: Rebels Used Mustard Gas
